DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , multicenter , Phase 2 study evaluate efficacy safety ABT-199 approximately 120 subject relapse refractory CLL B-cell receptor signal pathway inhibitor ( BCR PI ) treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Open-Label Study Efficacy Safety ABT-199 ( GDC-0199 ) Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) Subjects With Relapse Refractory B-Cell Receptor Signaling Pathway Inhibitor Therapy
